summary.Title: Waiter, Kragerø, Norway
summary.Presentation: Haven Restaurant og Bar, Kragerø, Norway, is looking for a waiter.Job descriptionTable service, and serving at events if needed.Contribute to a pleasant o

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Haven Restaurant og Bar, Kragerø, Norway, is looking for a waiter.

Job description
  • Table service, and serving at events if needed.
  • Contribute to a pleasant overall experience for guests. Be a good colleague for other employees.
  • Preparations before opening, and preparation for closing according to established routines.
  • Participate in catering assignments. Must be able to work independently in and outside Haven Restaurant.
  • Tackle a busy day with a good mood


Skills
  • Good experience with a la carte. Be able to work fast with good quality
  • Speak and understand Scandinavian language


Working hours

Shift between 10 am and 11 pm

Period

1 June 2025 end 31 August 2025. Maybe earlier for some employees.

Salary is based on experience.

We help with accommodation.

More information

Ragnar Brevik/Monica Køhler/Anna Hofset,
+47 9166 2200 / +47 9898 9191 / +47 99418 7653

How to apply?

Send CV to post@haven-restaurant.no
Latest application date is 1. May 2025

(from NAV EURES Norway)



Haven Restaurant is an unformal dining and meeting place.
We focus on simple, tasty dishes based on fresh products.
Our desire is to give our guests a pleasant overall experience in a relaxed environment. Good taste sensations with panoramic views to Kragerø harbor basins.
170 seats outside and 80 inside.

www.haven-restaurant.no
